需要安装如下包
[http://www.cygwin.com/setup-x86_64.exe](http://www.cygwin.com/setup-x86_64.exe)
一路next，到选镜像的时候选一下
接下来安装如下包，点击next
![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/ef9bc2852a134111a069e7d163b60612.png?x-oss-process=image/watermark,type_d3F5LXplbmhlaQ,shadow_50,text_Q1NETiBA5aSn5q-beg==,size_20,color_FFFFFF,t_70,g_se,x_16)

`mingw64-i686`-gcc-core 9.2.0-2
`mingw64-i686`-gcc-debuginfo 9.2.0-2
`mingw64-i686`-gcc-fortran 9.2.0-2
`mingw64-i686`-gcc-g++ 9.2.0-2
`mingw64-i686`-gcc-objc 9.2.0-2

`mingw64-x86_64`-gcc-core 9.2.0-2
`mingw64-x86_64`-gcc-debuginfo 9.2.0-2
`mingw64-x86_64`-gcc-fortran 9.2.0-2
`mingw64-x86_64`-gcc-g++ 9.2.0-2
`mingw64-x86_64`-gcc-objc 9.2.0-2
